metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15682 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
RDesktop version 1.8.4 contains multiple out-of-bound access readvulnerabilities in its code, which results in a denial of service (DoS)condition. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.These issues have been fixed in version 1.8.5

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rdesktop - 1.9.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.0-2').
